item.title: Easter egg on Google: New Year 2010 Countdown
item.description: My friend Amit had just created an account on GMail and logged out after that. Just then, he opened Google and was going to search something when I mentioned I’m Feeling Lucky to him. He asked what is that to which I thought of replying by showing him the official explanation by Google, so I clicked on ’the’ button without any search string. And voila! It showed this: After scratching my head for few seconds, it occurred to me that it could be the countdown to welcome the new year 2010.
